item.title: Hosting a static website with HTTPS on S3 Bucket
item.description: Today, I’ll host a static website with https on S3, I’ll use http://imyuvii.com as an example. Before starting you will need an AWS account and your DNS added in route53. So Why to use S3 and why not EC2? It’ll be cheaper because you’re not paying for an always running instance and EBS volumes. You don’t have to worry about stability and patching of your container. You don’t have to worry about web servers.
